data.title: Striped Detail Shoulder Bag
data.description:
GUESSStriped Detail Shoulder BagMRP₹ 12600Price DetailsMaximum Retail PriceRs. 12600(Incl. of all taxes)DiscountSelling PriceRs. 12600(Incl. of all taxes)inclusive of all taxesThis product is currently sold outOUT OF STOCKWISHLIST100% Original ProductsPay on delivery is not availableEasy 3 days returns and exchangesProduct DetailsProduct Details Black textured with striped detail shoulder bag, has 3 main compartments, magnetic button closure, 1 external pocket, 6 card holder, 1 inner pocketOne movable handleComes with a GUESS printed pouchSize & FitHeight: 17cmWidth: 24cmDepth: 6cmMaterial & Care100% PUWipe with clean and dry cloth to remove dustSpecificationsTypeShoulder BagSizeRegularCompartment ClosureButtonPrint or Pattern TypeStripedHandlesOne HandleOccasionCasualTrendsBaguetteNumber of External Pockets1See MoreCustomer Photos (4)Customer Reviews (1)5
I am absolutely loving my new Guess bag! The sleek design and stylish color make it perfect for work or a night out. The quality is top-notch, with sturdy straps and a durable interior. Plus, it's got plenty of room for all my essentials. Highly recommended


Kirtika Pant2 Mar 202500Product Code: 31284483
